original: Berntsson, Nils Bertil, tandläkare, Linköping, f. 25/9/15 i Gbg av kam-marskriv. Nils B. o. Maria Lundskog. G. 39 m. Karin Sahlgaard. Barn: Birgitta o. Björn ff. 42. — Stud:ex. v. Gbgs h. latin 34, tandl :kand. 35, tandläkare 38. Praktik i Linköping. Sekr. i Linköp. tandl :fören. sed. 45.
translated: Berntsson, Nils Bertil, dentist, Linköping, b. September 25, 1915 in Gothenburg to a commissioning clerk, Nils B. and Maria Lundskog. Married in 1939 to Karin Sahlgaard. Children: Birgitta and Björn born in 1942. Nils graduated from Gothenburg High Latin School in 1934, graduated with a dentistry degree in 1935, and became a licensed dentist in 1938. He worked as a dental practitioner in Linköping and also served as a secretary of the Linköping Dental Association starting from 1945.
